short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Estimates and displays the reading time for the content of the current page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reading Time Estimator

Ever wondered how long it will take to read an article before diving in? The Reading Time Estimator is here to help! This cute and user-friendly Chrome extension provides an accurate estimate of the reading time for any article on the web, so you can plan your reading sessions more effectively.

Features:

Instant Reading Time Calculation: Quickly estimate the time required to read any article on the current webpage.
User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy a playful and visually appealing design that makes checking reading times a delightful experience.
Accurate Estimations: Based on an average reading speed, ensuring you get a realistic reading time for various types of content.
One-Click Activation: Easily access the reading time estimate with a single click on the extension icon.
How It Works:

Open any webpage with an article.
Click on the Reading Time Estimator icon in your Chrome toolbar.
Instantly see the estimated reading time displayed in a charming pop-up.
Whether you're managing your time more efficiently or simply curious about how long an article will take to read, the Reading Time Estimator is the perfect companion for all your online reading adventures. Download now and make your reading experience smarter and more enjoyable!

Get Started:

Install the Extension: Add the Reading Time Estimator to your Chrome browser.
Start Estimating: Click the icon whenever you want to know the reading time for an article.
Enjoy Your Reading: Plan your reading sessions better with accurate time estimates.
